This place is large and there can be wait but it is worth it.  We went on the earlier side  (8ish) and were seated in less than 5 minutes.  The service was prompt and the wait staff were very helpful - between my broken Spanish and their understanding and patience we easily got the dishes we wanted (no intimidation).  The food was great, the tapas portions are very large so you could easily over order.  The atmosphere is very friendly and we ended up chatting with the table next to us for quite a while.  They did not order in rounds but instead all at once - and dish after dish kept coming to their table until they were overwhelmed - so a word of ADVICE - order a couple of things, eat and assess from there.  The waiters know you will be there for a long time so they have no problem with multiple rounds of orders (and the food comes very quickly).  Good quality and very fun.  Don't miss this place  - We will be back!
